titleStmt.title: The character of the beaux, in five parts ... to which is added The character of a Jacobite / written by a young gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Young gentleman.

notesStmt.note: "I. Of a nice affected beaux. II. A hector, or bully beaux. III. A country beaux. IV. A city beaux. V. A spruce beaux, alias, a lawyers clerk."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
